name: Die Roller
description:
Die Roller is my entry to the GMTK 2022 game jam.

**Fullscreen Recommended**

How To Play

- Roll the die around using WASD or the Arrow Keys.

- Maneuver the die to the goal tile the die will need to have the same number facing up to win.

- If the die is not the correct direction when rolling on to the goal tile or if you hit spikes that are coming up you will die and need to restart the level.
